aircraft.value: Griffin Guard - AC-3642-319 at Base Echo

defect_observed.value: Bleed air temperature exceedance. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pneumatic Starter component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 17/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 20/12/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 18/12/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 24/12/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 24/12/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Bleed air temperature exceedance. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pneumatic Starter component. Analysis
of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
